official_title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to provide for the licensing of facilities for the disposal of spent nuclear fuel, transuranic wastes, and high-level radioactive wastes.

summary.text: Amends the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to provide for the licensing of storage facilities for spent nuclear fuel, transuranic wastes, and high-level radioactive wastes.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 202 of the Energy Reorganization Act of 1974 to provide for the licensing of facilities for the disposal of spent nuclear fuel, transuranic wastes, and high-level radioactive wastes.
